FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, northerly 3 to 5 becoming variable 2 to 4, then cyclonic 4 to 6 later. In northwest, variable 3 or 4 at first in east, otherwise southwesterly veering northwesterly 5 to 7, backing westerly 4 or 5 later.
Sea state
Moderate or rough, becoming very rough later in northwest.
Weather
In southeast, fair then rain. In northwest, rain or showers.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally poor later. In northwest, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
